Data Encryption and Storage: By utilizing JSON Crack, you accept that your data is stored without encryption. However, JSON Crack implements suitable security measures to safeguard your data against unauthorized access and breaches. It is important to note that JSON Crack is not accountable for any instances of data loss, breaches, or unauthorized access. Users are solely responsible for maintaining the security of their data and accounts.
JSON Crack does not process user data unless explicitly triggered by the user through a server-side action. Until such action is initiated, data remains processed solely on the client-side.

When a user deletes data stored in the cloud (from the database), it undergoes hard deletion, rendering it permanently irretrievable and inaccessible by JSON Crack. This action ensures the complete removal of user data from the Service.
